author: Simone N
title: A beautiful (calm) gem in busy London!
text:
My partner and I have had a difficult few weeks and we wanted to get away... normally, I would have opted for a secret location in the countryside somewhere. Time however simply did not allow for my usual luxury and we decided to have a few nights in London.
I made my booking via booking.com and wanted to pay and upgrade my room.
Initially, I was told by the team it could not be confirmed until arrival.
We arrived pretty late to a fully booked hotel, with much disappointment I could not pay and upgrade.
Upon arrival to the room, although tired and a tad disappointed the room itself was clean and indeed everything one would expect (and more) for a 5-star hotel.
The next day we were upgraded to what I can say fully deserves its name to the 'wow' suite!
In honesty, both my partner and I would not have appreciated the beauty of this room had we stayed in it the night previous. It was also super appreciated that this was complimentary !
I have only commented thus far on the room(s) but in fairness, the entire experience was 5 star.
From the moment I walked into the hotel, the welcome, the drinks upon arrival even the barman was a welcome pleasure (and super funny)
